These cookies are necessary for the services and viewing experience of this site, and cannot be opted out of via this tool. If you still wish to remove these, you may do using your browser settings. A description of these technologies is provided in our [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy/default.aspx).

# News

Selecting a year value will change the news content

Select Year:

20242023

Showing 2024 undefined News

June 27, 2024 

[CleanSpark Announces Agreement to Acquire GRIID Infrastructure Based on an enterprise value of $155 Million and Expansion Plans of over 400 MW in Tennessee](/news/news-details/2024/CleanSpark-Announces-Agreement-to-Acquire-GRIID-Infrastructure-Based-on-an-enterprise-value-of-155-Million-and-Expansion-Plans-of-over-400-MW-in-Tennessee/default.aspx)

[Read More](/news/news-details/2024/CleanSpark-Announces-Agreement-to-Acquire-GRIID-Infrastructure-Based-on-an-enterprise-value-of-155-Million-and-Expansion-Plans-of-over-400-MW-in-Tennessee/default.aspx)

February 14, 2024 

[GRIID Infrastructure Announces Plans to Double Capacity of Lenoir City, Tenn. Bitcoin Mining Operations](/news/news-details/2024/GRIID-Infrastructure-Announces-Plans-to-Double-Capacity-of-Lenoir-City-Tenn.-Bitcoin-Mining-Operations/default.aspx)

February 6, 2024 

[GRIID Infrastructure to Add 60 MW with New Bitcoin Mining Facility in Tennessee](/news/news-details/2024/GRIID-Infrastructure-to-Add-60-MW-with-New-Bitcoin-Mining-Facility-in-Tennessee/default.aspx)

[Read More](/news/news-details/2024/GRIID-Infrastructure-to-Add-60-MW-with-New-Bitcoin-Mining-Facility-in-Tennessee/default.aspx)

January 29, 2024 

[GRIID to Begin Trading on Nasdaq Global Market Under Ticker “GRDI”](/news/news-details/2024/GRIID-to-Begin-Trading-on-Nasdaq-Global-Market-Under-Ticker-GRDI/default.aspx)

[Read More](/news/news-details/2024/GRIID-to-Begin-Trading-on-Nasdaq-Global-Market-Under-Ticker-GRDI/default.aspx)

January 3, 2024 

[GRIID Infrastructure Inc. Receives Commencement of Delisting Notice From the NYSE](/news/news-details/2024/GRIID-Infrastructure-Inc.-Receives-Commencement-of-Delisting-Notice-From-the-NYSE/default.aspx)

# Newsroom

Review our press releases, articles, executive media appearances or contact our media relations staff. 

## EXECUTIVE INTERVIEWS

Bitcoin 2021 Panel: [Bitcoin 2021: How To Build A (Profitable) Bitcoin Mine](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mhnRJshQwVA)

Coindesk TV: [How Crypto Miner GRIID Is Tackling Bitcoin's Energy Challenge](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VE2UWW7FNTE)

Empire: [Cleaning up the energy grid with Bitcoin mining | Marty Bent & Harry Sudock](https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=O5Ge-JkCUJQ)
